title: Dangerous Ideas Welcome: A Talk on Estuary with Paul VanderKlay
description:
I speak with everyone's favourite online pastor @Paul VanderKlay on his latest passion: Estuary. Estuary is a place for mixing ideas and saying what you really think. This was a deeply meaningful and enjoyable discussion and I hope you will find it as enriching as I did. You will also get to hear Paul curse which I found rather hilarious

Paul's YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGsDIP_K6J6VSTqlq-9IPlg
Follow Paul on twitter @PaulVanderKlay
Follow me on twitter here: @AndreaLynnLewis
email me at andreawiththebangs@gmail.com
